title: Butterscotch Fruit Salad
directions: Toss the diced apples with the packet of pudding mix and peanuts until well combined. Stir in the pineapple and whipped topping. Cover and refrigerate overnight.
ingredients: 1 (3.4 ounce) package butterscotch instant pudding mix
1 (15.25 ounce) can crushed pineapple, in juice
1 (16 ounce) package frozen non-dairy whipped topping, thawed
